items.sentence: I can't believe that I let you talk me into this.
I don't think Tom knows any other way to do that.
I'm really looking forward to watching your show.
Tom is already here and Mary should be here soon.
Let's walk over to Tom's and see what he's doing.
I know what to do, but I'm not sure how to do it.
I don't know exactly what I'm supposed to do now.
I think that it's time for you to come back home.
Tom was standing in front of the school, smoking.
Tom asked Mary what type of car she used to have.
In the desert, water is worth its weight in gold.
Tom didn't feel well, so he went to the hospital.
It took me a long time to get used to doing this.
That's the first time that that's happened to me.
I'm not surprised that Tom didn't accept the job.
How was I to know that I was supposed to do that?
Tom gave Mary a murderous look and left the room.
It is important to remember who your friends are.
Tom spent the entire day cleaning out the garage.
Tom has been playing the trumpet for three years.
Tom didn't want to hear anything Mary had to say.
This is the room where the author killed himself.
This is the most interesting book I've ever read.
Working on weekends is something I try not to do.
Be careful not to hit your thumb with the hammer.
Tom threatened to shoot Mary if she didn't leave.
Tom later went to the train station to meet Mary.
Tom has to get the application form in by Friday.
Tom got drunk for the first time at a frat party.
The snake began wrapping itself around Tom's leg.
What are three skills or traits you wish you had?
It's only a matter of time before Tom leaves you.
Why would your doctor send you to a cardiologist?
You should do everything that Tom asks you to do.
Tom told Mary it was her turn to wash the dishes.
I've been waiting a long time for this to happen.
I don't know exactly where or when that happened.
This mountain is covered with snow all year long.
Tom has been staying up late to study for finals.
Can you do the right thing for once in your life?
Tom has the same kind of computer that Mary does.
I don't think changing that would be a good idea.
I don't think that I need to tell you what to do.
Tom has been late for work three times this week.
Your things are in one of those boxes over there.
Tom is one of the most popular boys in our class.
I consider my driving skills to be above average.
What color are the last pair of shoes you bought?
Tom and Mary have written several books together.
The smell didn't seem to bother Tom in the least.
